snippet: The council had been slated to convene next Monday and Tuesday to consider, among other things, the membership of the Palestine Liberation Organization’s executive committee.
abstract: Palestinian National Council conference is postponed indefinitely due to factional infighting and disagreement about council's agenda and conference's structure; 700-member council has not had regular session since 1996.
lead_paragraph: The council had been slated to convene next Monday and Tuesday to consider, among other things, the membership of the Palestine Liberation Organization’s executive committee.

headline.main: Palestinian National Council Meeting Is Postponed Amid Boycotts
headline.print_headline: Middle East; West Bank: Council Meeting Postponed
